this game is a relaxing survival game that doesnt require any skill to play before playing it you need to watch at least a couple of videos explaining the basics of the game and teaching you to avoid common mistakes that players usually do if u want to 100 the game  it will take about 50 to 70 hours of playing most of them for staying afk or moving in patterns to get every resource possible you need in the playthrough
this game has more content than i was expecting if you like to grind and not be afraid of death then this game is for you

very fun craftingresource collecting game a bit like a crazy terraria but on a smaller scale once you unlock some tools like rods or automation things get really wild destruction everywhere theres also a bunch of puzzles and dungeons  items to craftfind tile selection is a bit finicky sometimes but besides that its quite polished   overall very relaxing  a good podcastyoutube in the background game after a hard working day

highly recommend setting your monitors hz to 60 before playing  im enjoying it a lot looking forward to continuing its like those mobile games where you grind for resources and expand the land but well polished and doesnt make you watch hundreds of ads
